name: Trenko
short_description: The graphical representation of Renko Boxes, with this indicator you can recreate the Renko strategy with the possibility of backtesting.

params.title: Box Info x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Label (empty = all)
params.content: Which label should monitor, if left blank monitors all labels

params.title: Antimartingala K%
params.content: The pyramidal multiplier for size calculation

params.title: Panel type ?
params.content: You can select the display between Banner or Box

params.title: Show Gross Profit ?
params.content: You can choose whether or not to display the gross profit

params.title: Show Net Profit ?
params.content: You can choose whether or not to display the net profit

params.title: Show Leverage ?
params.content: You can choose whether or not to display the current leverage

params.title: Show Antimartingala ?
params.content: You can choose whether or not to display the antimartingala next size

params.title: Show Global Drawdown ?
params.content: You can choose whether or not to display the global drawdown

params.title: Color
params.content: You can choose the font colour

params.title: Vertical Position
params.content: You can choose the vertical position

params.title: Horizontal Position
params.content: You can choose the horizontal position
